description: Returns a list of running clusters in your account.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name that identifies the cluster.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The generated unique ID of the cluster.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was created.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the resource was modified.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The provisioning status of the cluster.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page of results returned. If nextToken is returned, there are more results available. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours. Using an expired pagination token returns an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.
